name: Mad Chloroplast
description:
Race through the madness in this platformer hack and slash game to defeat the Mad Chloroplast before midnight. we can't revive you when its past midnight. Play faster to get better power ups.

Arrow keys == Movement

X == Jump

C == Attack

when you lose completely game restarts. didn't have time to implement something appropriate.

Team members:

Mrj - Code, Design, some Art

Golyaar - almost all the art

and things we didn't do ourself:

Sound   by   Juhani Junkala (public domain)

Music   by   Spring-Enterprises (public domain)
